No. 94547)} Sub: Revision of rates of House Rent Allowance (HRA) after increase of Dearness Allowance (DA) to 50% reg: Consequent upon the revision of the rate of Dearness Allowance (DA) to 509 W.e.f. 01.01.2024 vide D/o Expenditure OM No.1/1/2024-E-II(B) dated 12.03.2024, the rates of House Rent Allowance (HRA) stand revised W.e.f. 01.01.2024, as detailed below:_ Classification of Existing Rate Revised Rate Cities Town 27% of Basic 30% of Basic Pay 18% of Basic 20% of Basic 9% of Basic 10% of Basic 2 The other terms & conditions will remain as stipulated in D/o Expenditure OM No.2/5/2017-E.II (B) dated 07.07.2017 . 3.
